# GitHub Copilot Instructions for ShapeCrawler

This repository uses comprehensive AI agent instructions documented in [AGENTS.md](../AGENTS.md) at the root of the repository.

Please refer to [AGENTS.md](../AGENTS.md) for:
- Project overview and architecture
- Code style guidelines and mandatory rules
- Testing guidelines and workflows
- Build and validation procedures
- Common pitfalls to avoid
- Quick reference commands

The AGENTS.md file contains all the necessary guidance for AI coding assistants working on the ShapeCrawler project.
